main event: Multiple reports of unidentified flying objects observed in Mesa, Arizona on various dates.
interesting points: The observations noted cigar-shaped objects with orange rectangular lights,Several personnel and private citizens reported sightings,One sighting included a bright disc-shaped object approximately 50 feet in diameter,The objects were seen moving at very high speeds and hovering with no sound,No physical evidence was found to correlate with the sightings.
sighted object: cigar-shaped and disc-shaped objects with lights
